faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about ConvertFix

items.question: How is this different from free tools like Fibr.ai or VWO?
items.answer:
Free tools give you a score (72/100).

We tell you EXACTLY what to fix:
"Your headline is unclear. Change from 'Revolutionary Platform for Teams' to 'Slack for Remote Teams' (7 words, clear benefit)."

Plus, free tools are lead magnets. You'll get sales calls.

We're a product, not a lead gen funnel.

items.question: Can AI really match a human consultant?
items.answer:
For $29-99? Yes.

Our AI analyzed 1,000+ successful launches (Basecamp, Notion, Linear, Superhuman). It learned their patterns.

For $2,000, a human might spend 10 hours custom-analyzing your niche.

But for quick wins? AI is faster and just as accurate.

Think of it as "tier 1 support" that handles 80% of cases perfectly.

items.question: What if my landing page is complex/technical/B2B?
items.answer:
AI trained on every category:
Dev Tools, Enterprise SaaS, Fintech, Health Tech, Crypto.

If you're B2B SaaS, it's seen 200+ similar pages.
It knows your buyers care about ROI, integrations, security.

Complex = more reason to audit.
Simpler pages are easier to guess. Yours needs data.

items.question: How long does it take?
items.answer:
60-90 seconds after you submit URL.

No waiting days for a consultant.

You'll have your PDF in your inbox before you finish your coffee.

items.question: What if I don't agree with the recommendations?
items.answer:
Then don't implement them.

We show you data-backed patterns (e.g., "Notion's headline is 7 words, yours is 23").

You decide if it applies to your case.

But remember: AI analyzed 1,000+ successful launches. Patterns exist for a reason.

items.question: Do I need coding skills to implement fixes?
items.answer:
No.

80% of fixes are copy changes:
• Headline: Copy-paste new text
• CTA: Change button text
• Social proof: Add testimonial section

20% are layout tweaks (move CTA higher, add pricing table).

If you use Webflow/Wix/Squarespace, you can click-and-drag.

No coding.

items.question: What's included in the re-test?
items.answer:
Professional: 50% off second audit after 7 days ($24.50 instead of $49).

Premium: FREE re-audit within 30 days.

Use it after implementing fixes to measure improvement.

items.question: Can I get a refund?
items.answer:
Yes.

30-day money-back guarantee, no questions asked.

Stripe refund takes 5-10 business days to appear in your account.

items.question: Is this a one-time payment or subscription?
items.answer:
One-time.

No recurring charges.

Pay once, get your audit. That's it.

items.question: What if I implement these changes and it still doesn't work?
items.answer:
Then you'll know it's not your landing page.

It's something else (product-market fit, traffic source, pricing).

That clarity is worth $29-99.

Most founders waste months guessing.
You'll know in 60 seconds + 1 week of testing.

Plus: 30-day money-back guarantee.
You risk nothing.

intro: I've spent 7 years coding. I know how to build products.
But I don't know if YOU will find this valuable until you try it.
benefits: Full access to all features (10/20/30-point audits)
Beta pricing locked forever (no price increases)

Early access to v2.0 features (A/B test suggestions, heatmap analysis)
asks: Your honest feedback (what worked, what didn't)
A testimonial if it helps you convert (optional, but appreciated)
Patience if there's a bug (I'll fix it same-day)
betaPricing.closing:
This is bootstrapper-to-bootstrapper.
No BS. Just a tool that helps you convert.
